doc.field: Northern Trust Corp said it filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission to offer up to 150 mln dlrs of debt securities. The company said it may sell the securities through underwriters, who may include Goldman Sachs and Co, or directly to other purchasers. Proceeds will be used for general purposes, which may include possible acquisitions, refunding outstanding securities and repaying short-term debt, the bank holding company said. Reuter
